issue.title: Filter on Users by Organism
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

In the backend, in the user management screen, there is mean to filter by "organism".

--> a filter "select an organism" should be added to ease the management of users. The filter should take in account the propertie "is Member of" only.



**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Thomas,

Do you agree ? do you have any other input for filters on this screen ?

**Original author :** Portier Thomas

Yes and I'd remove the category filter. There is no more category menu item and I think user categories are not usefull.

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

OK.

concerning the "categories" (Joomla categories), there is indeed no sense to keep it.

BUT as categories (easySDI categories) will be added soon on organism level (see #642), I change the #642 ticket (add the filter "categories" on "organism page" in BE)

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hi Xavier,

As we are working on #642, I propose that we realize such cleaning...

Do you agree with?
